Quote: I do me. I don't listen to anyone else. I'm my own person.

Quote: I'm not a religious person, but I do believe that I am a spiritual man.

Quote: Success is not about earning more, it's about learning more.
Author: Jason Statham

Quote: A conquering army on the border will not be stopped by eloquence.
